attributes.action: Stop the Education Secretary Michael Gove from banning the availability of Literatrure to all of our children in school
attributes.additional_details:
Michael Gove must not be allowed to stop the freedom of choice of the written word.  His motives are dishonourable and are not Educationally advantageous to our children.  He must reverse his decision to withdraw ANY Authors from the Curriculum.

No-one should be allowed to stop the freedom and nurturing of the written word.

He is becoming a megalomaniac.
